summary: This document is a letter from Jeffrey Epstein authorizing Harry Beller to have signing authority on the account of JEGE, LLC at Deutsche Bank. It serves as a formal request to the bank regarding account management.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the author of the letter, granting signing authority to Harry Beller for the account of JEGE, LLC.

persons.name: Harry Beller
persons.context: Harry Beller is mentioned as the individual who is being granted signing authority on the account of JEGE, LLC.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is addressed in the letter as the contact person at Deutsche Bank for the authorization request.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is granting Harry Beller authority to manage his business account, indicating a professional relationship.
Jeffrey Epstein is communicating with Amanda Kirby at Deutsche Bank regarding account management.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY 10154
keyFacts: The document is a letter dated September 30, 2013.
Jeffrey Epstein authorizes Harry Beller to have signing authority on the account of JEGE, LLC.
The letter is addressed to Amanda Kirby at Deutsche Bank.
